meanings.definition: A city in North Africa, typically walled and built in a traditional style.
meanings.sent1: The medinas in North Africa have narrow streets and colorful buildings.
meanings.sent2: Tourists love exploring the historic medinas in Morocco.
meanings.sent3: In the medinas, even the stray cats seem to know their way around.
meanings.sent4: The medinas stand like ancient fortresses guarding the secrets of the past.
meanings.sent5: The bustling medinas are like vibrant mosaics of culture and history.
